text: Aldridge Knight Bousfield (April 5, 1941 - October 4, 2020),Cited from American Men and Women of Science, Thomson Gale 2004 and known as Pete, was an American mathematician. He was known for his works in Algebraic Topology and for the idea of Bousfield localization. Bousfield was born in Boston, Massachusetts. He was a Fellow of the American Mathematical Society, Bousfield died on October 4, 2020 at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American mathematicians Category:Scientists from Boston
